name: Talking Elephant King Red
description:
Meet King Red the talking elephant. Red is a very gentle talking elephant king that loves to make new friends and to play with them. He responds to your touch and repeats everything you say with his funny voice. He loves to play with his little kid and to dance. King Red’ has also a lot of exciting games spread around the jungle and he cannot wait to play them with you!
Spend some time with Red and enjoy the time. He will show you some cool moves, his passion for music and all his favorite games.

If you like talking animal games like talking cat or talking dog or animal games in general then you will love Talking Elephant King Red!

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Talking animal: talking elephant
✔ Elephant game - elephant games
✔ The elephant repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Exciting touch games with many levels like basketball flick, unblock puzzle, match- 3, racing etc.
✔ Many different animations
✔ Amazing soundboard with many funny sentences, sounds from animals, guns etc.
✔ Big fun for teenagers and adults of all ages

Talking Elephant King Red is a free application. Download Talking Elephant King Red now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
